GSD.product_version: versions from v4.2 to before v5.4.200
GSD.description:
i40e: Fix call trace in setup_tx_descriptors

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.200 by commit ff6e03fe84bc917bb0c907d02de668c2fe101712, it was introduced in version v4.2 by commit e17bc411aea8fbebc51857037f104ab09f765120. For more details please see the references link.
